sentence.Network_en: The agency's major financial assistance is provided through its Guaranty Bank Loan program.
sentence.Network_cn: 该局的财政援助主要是通过担保银行贷款计划提供的.

sentence.Network_en: The guarantor shall be held liable within the agreed scope of guaranty.
sentence.Network_cn: 担保人在约定的担保范围内承担责任.

sentence.Network_en: The provisions on guaranty in this Law shall apply to the counter - guaranty.
sentence.Network_cn: 反 担保适用本法担保的规定.
